attributes.action: Change laws in allowing private landlords charging what they want for rent.
attributes.additional_details: After private renting for the last 5 years, I have recently found myself in a situation where I couod potentially looking at being homeless with 2 children, my lamdlord has decided he wants to sell, i have no where to go, no social housing are accepting applicants, and the house prices are ridiculous for rent, I work full time but I simply vamnt afford the private rent prices, something needs to be done to stop landlords charging what they want,
attributes.background: Take a step in fighting for people who can't afford mortgages, who have no option but to private rent and are financially struggling because of the rent prices

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Introduce a cap for annual rent increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607406

Introduce a regulator for private landlords and caps for rent: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611473

If you are at risk of homelessness, you could contact Shelter, a charity that provides housing advice: https://england.shelter.org.uk/
